subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Andrei Markov had a goal and an assist, and Robert Lang had two assists to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a 3-2 victory against the Nashville Predators on Thursday night.
snippet: Andrei Markov had a goal and an assist, and Robert Lang had two assists to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a 3-2 victory against the Nashville Predators on Thursday night.
